Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the removal of graffiti from commercial and residential buildings, and in relation to establishing a process whereby the city may clean graffiti from these buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the removal of graffiti from commercial and residential buildings, and in relation to establishing a process whereby the city may clean graffiti from these buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the removal of graffiti from commercial and residential buildings, and in relation to establishing a process whereby the city may clean graffiti from these buildings.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
